item.description:
This is very exciting. Krista and I will have images of the designer clothing collection so we can get together to finalize and collaborate this important shoot. There have been several changes since our last meeting.

We are working with the designers Fall 2012 collection, since this is her first collection. Our shoot is to provide the designer with images that can be used to compliment her existing marketing materials, but it will be entirely our concept.

We will present to you...

images from the collection

and images of models to consider for shoot.

We still need help. If you are a photographer, have space to do a photo shoot, work as a makeup artist, hair stylist or wardrobe stylist, set designer, model  or would simply like to be an extra hand, we'd love to have you participate. In order to delegate responsibilities for this event, it is very important that all who would like to be involved attend.

Please RSVP.

I look forward to seeing you.

Lorrie
item.how_to_find_us: Will find a table to gather

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: 9th planning meeting for designer photo even
